          <title>
            <string language="en">Metals and non-metals in the periodic table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metalle und Nichtmetalle in der periodischen 
Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Métaux et non-métaux dans la table périodique</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Metales y no metales en el vector periódico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram differentiates the metals from non-metals in the periodic table of elements.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme différencie les métaux des

          </description>

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama distingue los metales de los no
